item.title: Malayahs Consultancy Services
item.description:
About Us

Malayahs Consultancy Services specializes in HSEQ consultancy, business development, audits, and training. We provide tailored team building programs to enhance organizational performance and ensure compliance with industry standards.

Our Services

  • HSEQ Consultancy: Comprehensive health, safety, environment, and quality consulting
  • Business Development: Strategic guidance for business growth and improvement
  • Audits: Professional assessment of business processes and compliance
  • Training Programs: Specialized training for organizational development
  • Team Building: Customized programs to enhance team performance

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Ria Malayah
  • Phone: 346-2781
  • Email: rialisa@yahoo.com
